comment_text: I love things that go to 11!  Perhaps the game could come in cacoon for storage.
Will the game be bigger than 18 inches?
I like the way you think.  It will be bigger than Stongehenge.
Perhaps each one could just have a spork
Multi-functional.  Great idea.  Will will ask our user group.
I could really use this at the Orioles games, although I wish it didn't have a yankees logo.
You could get any team on it, even ones that never win.  :)
Could they make this for people with astigmatism.  :)
I will ask our head researcher is that is possible.
